item.title: Recent answers on StackOverflow
item.description: Ansible: passing a list of objects to a python script python ansible Installing Xfce on CentOS 7 via ansible yum ssh ansible centos7 yum Where does `set -x` cause bash to print to? bash Ansible : How to copy everything from "Files" folders of a specific role ansible ansible-2.x ansible-facts Sequentially apply files to DB in specific order using Python python python-3.x Changing capitalization of filenames in Git git rename case-sensitive file-rename Dynamically adding methods to the object doesn't work correctly (setattr) python python-3.
